mapper.sql: w.id,w.activeNo, w.nickname, w.sex, w.province, w.city, w.country, w.headimgurl, w.privilegeStr, w.unionid, w.openid, w.createBy, w.createTime, w.updateBy, w.updateTime, w.version, w.isDeleted, w.userID, w.refreshToken, w.accessToken, w.refreshTokenTime, w.accessTokenTime,w.ticket,w.ticketTime

where 1=1 and w.id = #{condition.id} and w.nickname = #{condition.nickname} and w.sex = #{condition.sex} and w.province = #{condition.province} and w.city = #{condition.city} and w.country = #{condition.country} and w.headimgurl = #{condition.headimgurl} and w.privilegeStr = #{condition.privilegeStr} and w.unionid = #{condition.unionid} and w.openid = #{condition.openid} and w.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and w.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and w.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy} and w.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and w.version = #{condition.version} and w.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} and w.userID = #{condition.userID} and w.refreshToken = #{condition.refreshToken} and w.accessToken = #{condition.accessToken} and w.refreshTokenTime = #{condition.refreshTokenTime} and w.accessTokenTime = #{condition.accessTokenTime} and w.ticketTime = #{condition.ticketTime} and w.activeNo = #{condition.activeNo}

where 1=1 and w.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(w.nickname) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.nickname}),'%')) and UPPER(w.sex) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.sex}),'%')) and UPPER(w.province) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.province}),'%')) and UPPER(w.city) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.city}),'%')) and UPPER(w.country) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.country}),'%')) and UPPER(w.headimgurl) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.headimgurl}),'%')) and UPPER(w.privilegeStr) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.privilegeStr}),'%')) and UPPER(w.unionid) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.unionid}),'%')) and UPPER(w.openid) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.openid}),'%')) and UPPER(w.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(w.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(w.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%')) and UPPER(w.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(w.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(w.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%')) and UPPER(w.userID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.userID}),'%')) and UPPER(w.refreshToken) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.refreshToken}),'%')) and UPPER(w.accessToken) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.accessToken}),'%')) and UPPER(w.refreshTokenTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.refreshTokenTime}),'%')) and UPPER(w.accessTokenTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.accessTokenTime}),'%'))
mapper.update: update weixin set nickname=#{nickname}, sex=#{sex}, province=#{province}, city=#{city}, country=#{country}, headimgurl=#{headimgurl}, privilegeStr=#{privilegeStr}, unionid=#{unionid}, openid=#{openid}, createBy=#{createBy}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, userID=#{userID}, refreshToken=#{refreshToken}, accessToken=#{accessToken}, refreshTokenTime=#{refreshTokenTime}, accessTokenTime=#{accessTokenTime}, ticket=#{ticket}, ticketTime=#{ticketTime}, activeNo=#{activeNo}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from weixin w where w.id = #{id} and w.isDeleted = false

SELECT count(w.id) as wnum, ( SELECT count(p.id) FROM personalauthen p WHERE p.createTime > date_sub(now(), INTERVAL ${condition.num} ${condition.unit}) ) as pnum, ( SELECT count(e.id) FROM enterpriseauthen e WHERE e.createTime > date_sub(now(), INTERVAL ${condition.num} ${condition.unit}) ) as enum, ( SELECT count(f.id) FROM follow f WHERE f.isDeleted = FALSE and f.createTime > date_sub(now(), INTERVAL ${condition.num} ${condition.unit}) ) AS fnum FROM weixin w WHERE w.createTime > date_sub(now(), INTERVAL ${condition.num} ${condition.unit})
